channel.title: Hi i'm David
channel.description: Recent content on Hi i'm David

item.title: Google Maps 2017 - 2018 Summer Internship
item.description: Over the past summer (2017 - 2018) I worked on the Google Maps Location Sharing team! Location Sharing in Maps allows you to share your location with someone. Typical use cases include sharing with family members when overseas and sharing with friends to try meet up somewhere. I worked on two features to improve the user experience when sharing location by providing more information to the person being shared with, I can now talk about because they launched!

item.title: Hello World
item.description: World! I’m not sure what I’m going to do with this, I guess this is a blog of sorts although using a blogging platform like medium will probably be easier ü§î…I guess I just like writing in *.md.

Projects I’ve done a range of hackathons, random side projects and a few pieces of polished work. Hopefully this showcases a diverse range of them. Google Maps Location Sharing A overview of what I did during my Google internship Implemented two features on Google Maps Location Sharing during my last Google internship. This included the server as well as the Android work. Telstra Swagger Platform Automating SDK generation of APIs using Swagger Forth year Software Engineering project with Telstra.

Resume Technical Skills: pdf updated March 2018 var typed = new Typed(".type", { strings: ["Java", "Python", "JavaScript", "C", "SQL", "C++", "TypeScript", "Swift", "Bash", "HTML", "CSS", "Perl", "React", "Android"], typeSpeed: 150, backSpeed: 150, loop: true, loopCount: Infinity }); I’m self taught in web technologies and have worked across the stack in various projects including backend (Flask, SpringBoot, Node), frontend (React, jquery) and mobile (Android) work. Currently I am trying to upskill myself in React, TypeScript, React Native and TensorFlow.
